headline: How The Narrative Around CoStar Group (CSGP) Is Shifting After Guidance Reset And Buybacks
summary: What Changed In CoStar Group’s Valuation Story CoStar Group’s fair value estimate has been trimmed from about US$91.94 to about US$84.82 as analysts factor in a slightly higher discount rate of about 8.76% and a more measured long term revenue growth outlook of about 15.19%. These adjustments reflect a balancing act between confidence in the company’s long term potential and concern about execution risk and valuation after the latest 2026 and medium term guidance update. Stay with this...
